TextView.android:text:
The Quiz consists of 3 categories- 
1. Technology, Gadgets, Internet and Internet Culture 
2. Movies 
3. Gaming

Each team can have up to 3 members – one specialist for each category.

There will be 3 rounds.

Rapid fire round - 
In this round, the team will be given a time of 1 minute in which they will be subjected to as many questions as they can answer in one round. Any member of each team can answer the questions put to the team. 
+5 for each correct answer. NO NEGATIVE MARKING. 
Some teams will be eliminated in this round.

Specialist round – 
In this round, each specialist from each team will be called and will be subjected to 5 questions of their own category. Only the specialist of each team is allowed to answer these questions. +10 for each correct answer and -5 FOR EACH WRONG ANSWER.

Final round - 
In this round, each team will be given 4 random choices of topics. The team has to choose two of them and answer ONE question on each. If the team to whom the question is given is able to answer it correctly then it will be awarded with +20 points otherwise -10 points will be given in case of an incorrect answer. However, the team has the option to skip the question and if this is the case, then the question will be passed to the next team. If this team chooses to answer the question then it will be awarded with +10 points for a correct answer or -5 points for an incorrect answer. If the 2nd team is not willing to answer the question then the questions will be passed to the next team and so on.


At the end of all three rounds, the total score for each team will be calculated and the winner will be declared.
